column5: Decided to hit the river yesterday afternoon to take advantage of the warmer temps and see if I could raise a few eyes for dinner..  Got set-up around 4:00PM and shortly afterwards, it was non stop action   ...I was off the ice by 5:30PM with a 5 out of 8 record...The bigger eyes were caught aggressively jigging a spoon tipped with a full size golden shiner....the Windlass tip-up had a jig head and same size shiners, but produced much smaller eyes...  I kept 2 for dinner and threw the others back for a chance to grow bigger...

Great report and pics Steve  Real nice looking eyes    Got to love it when fish are active and get non stop action What was the length of the ones on the pics?  Looks to me like around 17" - 19" Good job Steve and thanks for sharing Jacques
Nice eyes Steve..........   See ya Sunday
Good ones!!  If you dont mind my asking, were you jigging deep or shallow?
beauty fish!  I really gotta get out sometime to target them through the ice!
Nice job !
Ottawa rivers finest !!!! looks like a walleye dinner to me..LOL..LOL. cheers

Thanks guys!!...  WE had another wild afternoon yesterday.....12 eyes between 3 of us!!  Hoping to get out later today and tomorrow morning to try a little deeper shoal I know for some big ones  ......I heard a rumour that Leechman, Fish Finder and Fishing 24/7 may be paying me a visit sometime this weekend as well...
Have a great weekend Steve. You're doing good. Thanks for posting.
nice fat fish
Well Leechman Fish-Finder and 24/7 are not getting to your place unless '' WHITESPINNERBAIT '' brings them   :P
Really? Wow that's awesome, good job!  (may have to fish the Ottawa it seems  )
Nice walleyes TMH!

It's a bit of a trek for you Mike, but anytime you want, you're more than welcome to come out!!...I don't have my shack out this year but I have keys to 2 of my buddies or just drive the truck out like I do away from the crowds
Sorry Paul   ...not enough coffee in me in this morning......LEECHMAN, WHITESPINNERBAIT AND FISHING 24/7....how's that dude??
Check your PM Paul...... I'm ready if your are
Man, I would LOVE to take you up on your offer if I could swing it!  (That right there is what makes this board great.   )
I'm heading out at 3:30....they'll hit a bit later today because of the bright skies
I don't think Paul is checking his PM's..... I'll have to go and knock on his door to see if he wants to go.
It sounds like not only do you have the Wall-ice schooling around you... but now you have a school of fishermen around you too Steve!!!
LOL....I'd say. In fact I'd have Solo pick me up on his way if it were at all possible, alas it's not.  That's some fine fish'n you have there Steve.
go knock on pauls door and remind him to bring me my camera steve NEEDS the picture of THE JUMBO perch he got!
Those are some pretty nice eyes! Must have been a good meal!  Good report!
